topic.title: How to Factory Reset Panasonic Phones
topic.shortdesc: Before you start to provision Panasonic phones with , you need to reset Panasonic phones to factory default settings. Otherwise, Auto Provision may fail because of the previous configurations on the phone.

body.p: This guide takes Panasonic HDV130 running firmware 01.008 as an example.

ol.li: Press the Menu soft key (middle soft key) at the bottom of the screen.
Select System Settings from the menu.

Select Yes when asked if you are sure you want to factory reset the phone.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
